title: Can you help me make a short story? - Quora

response.answer_text: A short story has about up to 7,500 words, It much like other stories can be made in various perspectives; 1st person: From the perspective of a character who was there! It usually has multiple “we’s” or “I’s” and explains what he/she experienced. 2nd Person: From the perspective of a narrator telling you about what is happening! It usually has multiple “you’s” and it’s the rarest perspective. 3rd Person: From the perspective of the other characters but not the narrator! It is the most used perspective in literature. There are also multiple types of showing the perspective: Omniscient: The narrator knows everything Semi-omniscient: The narrator knows some Limited: The narrator knows little There is also numerous literary techniques used by authors to explain their stories, Symbolism; the usage of a symbol in a story to signal or identify something in the said story. Theme; the message of the story it usually involves a political or social message supporting something. Chekov’s Gun; when something is said or made in a story that is previously used or made. But this should give you some ideas on how to write a short story!
I can only help, if you start :-P
